tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SocialMediaSentiments (
    post_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    post_content TEXT,
    sentiment_score FLOAT,
    author_id UUID,
    post_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE social_media_posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    post_content TEXT,
    post_likes INT,
    post_comments INT,
    post_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE product_sentiments (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    positive_sentiments INT,
    negative_sentiments INT,
    neutral_sentiments INT
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id UUID REFERENCES posts(post_id),
    user_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id),
    comment_text TEXT,
    comment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE reactions (
    reaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id UUID REFERENCES posts(post_id),
    user_id UUID REFERENCES users(user_id),
    reaction_type TEXT,
    reaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE brand_users (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
username VARCHAR(255),
followers_count INT,
created_at TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE brand_posts (post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
user_id INT,
post_content TEXT,
created_at TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE public_opinions (opinion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
post_id INT,
sentiment_score FLOAT,
created_at TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE brand_products (product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
product_name VARCHAR(255),
price DECIMAL(10, 2),
release_date DATE);

CREATE TABLE brand_hashtags (tag_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
hashtag VARCHAR(100),
post_id INT,
created_at TIMESTAMP);
